      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_5a3e2f965206d2bca399496a6efdfb52701debb1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Liquid-vapour changes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flüssigkeit-Dampf Änderungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">changements de Liquide-vapeur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mudanças do Líquido-vapor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cambiamenti del Liquido-vapore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλαγές υγρός-ατμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cambios del Li'quido-vapor</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates that heating a liquid changes it to vapour and cooling the vapour down changes it back to liquid.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cooling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distillation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">evaporation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vapour</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, daß die Heizung
einer Flüssigkeit sie zum Dampf ändert und das Abkühlen des Dampfes
ihn unten zurück zu Flüssigkeit ändert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre que la chauffage d'un 
liquide le change en vapeur et le refroidissement de la vapeur la 
change vers le bas de nouveau au liquide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra que aquecer um líquido o 
muda ao vapor e refrigerar o vapor o muda para baixo para trás ao 
líquido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra che riscaldare un liquido 
lo cambia al vapore e raffreddare il vapore giù lo cambia di nuovo a 
liquido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα διευκρινίζει ότι η θέρμανση ενός 
υγρού το αλλάζει στον ατμό και την ψύξη του ατμού κάτω από τις 
αλλαγές αυτό πίσω στο υγρό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra que la calefacción de un 
líquido lo cambia al vapor y refrescar el vapor abajo lo cambia de 
nuevo a líquido.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
